Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string name identifying the product list's source.
setProductListSource(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the list source name associated with the products in the analytics hit. This value is used with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_DETAIL_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CLICK_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: An integer representing the progress of the checkout flow. example: 4 or 5.
setCheckoutStep(int).Description: Sets the checkout processes's progress. This value is used with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CHECKOUT_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CHECKOUT_OPTION_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string representing the coupon code used in a transaction.
setTransactionCouponCode(java.lang.Strin.Description: Sets the coupon code used in a transaction. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A number representing the revenue from a transaction.
setTransactionRevenue(double).Description: Sets the transaction's total revenue. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A number representing the shipping costs from a transaction.
setTransactionShipping(double).Description: Sets the transaction's shipping costs. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string id identifying a transaction
setTransactionId(java.lang.String).Description: The unique id associated with the transaction. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string identifying the transaction affiliation.
setTransactionAffiliation(java.lang.Stri.Description: Sets the transaction's affiliation value. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

ProductAction(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the product action for all the products included in the hit. Valid values include "detail", "click", "add", "remove", "checkout", "checkout_option", "purchase" and "refund". All these values are also defined in this class for ease of use. You also also send additional values with the hit for some specific actions. See the action documentation for details.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string name identifying the product list.
setProductActionList(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the list name associated with the products in the analytics hit. This value is used with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_DETAIL_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CLICK_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A number representing the revenue from a transaction.
setTransactionTax(double).Description: Sets the transaction's total tax. This value is used for @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_PURCHASE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_REFUND_E@ actions.

Returns: Returns the same object to enable chaining of methods.
Parameters: A string label/option associated with the checkout.
setCheckoutOptions(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the label associated with the checkout. This value is used with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CHECKOUT_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#ProductAction#ACTION_CHECKOUT_OPTION_E@ actions.

ClassDesc: Class to construct transaction/checkout or other product interaction related information for a Google Analytics hit. Use this class to report information about products sold, viewed or refunded. This class is intended to be used with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ecommerce#Product_E@. Instances of this class can be associated with @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#HitBuilders#HitBuilder#setProductAction_E@. Typical usage:
